Text:
This program is different from other cracking softwares like (Sentry or CForce) because
this program never skips a combo (it will keep retrying until it get a 401 or 200 response)
that's why the test will be slow but very accurate, if you want it a little faster make sure you have about 100+
threads/bots and in proxy settings uncheck the "Use "GET" method for proxies" and also, alot of good proxies.

This version is BETA and might have alot of bugs, it would be muchly appreciated if you reported them 
at EZCracker@hotmail.com.


Minimum requirements:
256 MB Ram


Recommended requirements:
1 GB Ram



Bugs known:

Sometimes program throws error "Out of stack space" when running too much bots
or when the program uses too much memory.
Yeah, okay... 300 seeders, and only 2 connected. Uploader and the one who did first comment perhaps? And dl speed is only .7 kb/s. It's only 7mb, there aren't that many problems in the world.
i think its a good upload but it'll help if u r seeding..
